blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Love & Other Drugs
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TTYgIt

by adoctoraday

It’s 1985, the height of the AIDS crisis and Peter Parker is a young, disillusioned journalist for the Bugle, trying to write stories about the men and women dying from AIDS, but all his editor seems to care about is who Tony Stark is sleeping with this week, and all Tony Stark seems to care about is selling more weapons. With evidence of black market arms dealing, Peter sets out to find the truth and destroy the Stark name—a much harder task when the man in question is kidnapped by the very terrorist who have been using his weapons.
The billionaire returns a changed man, and finds himself turning to an unexpected source for help—Peter Parker. Together they search for the truth behind Tony’s kidnapping and in the process, discover each other.

Words: 7092, Chapters: 2/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Iron Man (Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Michelle Jones, Pepper Potts, Happy Hogan, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Ned Leeds, May Parker (Spider-Man), Obadiah Stane, Ho Yinsen, Jarvis (Iron Man movies), J. Jonah Jameson
  • Relationships: Peter Parker/Tony Stark, Michelle Jones/Pepper Potts, James “Bucky” Barnes/Peggy Carter/Steve Rogers, Ned Leeds & Peter Parker, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Alternate Universe - Historical, Alternate Universe - 1980s, 80’s Music, Iron Man 1, Pre-Serum Steve Rogers, Vietnam War, Loss of Parent(s), Grief/Mourning, Homophobia, Homophobic Language, Period-Typical Homophobia, Bisexual Peter Parker, Journalist Peter Parker, Flirting, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Hurt Tony Stark, Tony Stark Has Issues, Tony Stark Feels, Past Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Protective Pepper Potts, Pepper Potts & Tony Stark Friendship, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark Friendship, Awesome James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Minor Carol Danvers/James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Hurt James “Rhodey” Rhodes, HIV/AIDS, AIDS crisis, New York City, Pain, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Angst, Fluff and Angst, Angst and Hurt/Comfort, Angst and Fluff and Smut, Smut, Falling In Love, Boys In Love, Friends to Lovers, Dating, Love, Declarations Of Love, Awesome Jarvis (Iron Man movies), Drug Use, Drinking, Drinking to Cope, Depression, internalized self loathing, Writing, Newspapers, News Media, Journalism, Howard Stark’s A+ Parenting, Howard Stark’s Bad Parenting, Flashbacks, Maria Stark’s A+ Parenting, Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, Past Child Abuse, Arc Reactor, Tony Stark Still Has Arc Reactor, Kissing, First Kiss, Kissing in the Snow, love & other drugs, Torture, Obadiah Stane is an Asshole


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TTYgIt

title: Always in forever
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2YR52SX

by Imagaydisaterpleasehelp777

Uh, this is my first fic, I have absolutely no idea what I’m doing, uh yeet? also, I suck at summaries but

Aunt may kicked Peter out and he’s living on the streets and one day Clint finds him and steals a sandwich for him, well not steals but Peter gets his sandwich, and then he rescues banner and I haven’t really gotten that far so uh yes.

also thank you Grammarly for helping

blog.name: hellzyeahthewebwieldingavenger
blog.title: Hellz Yeah, Spider-Man: The Web Wielding Avenger
blog.description:
A blog all about my love for Peter Benjamin Parker, his friends, family, enemies and world in general. Expect images, rants, musings and long winded essays of the Web Head and why I think he's the greatest comic book Superhero of all time. 

I LOVE comments and questions so leave some as you pass by as well as call me on any facts I have gotten wrong.

Also check out my sub-pages for F.A.Q.s and a key for when I abbreviate.

summary: Today is 4 of april, RDJ birthday, I'n watching IronMan 1, the movie that got me hook to RDJ and Tony Stark, and I'm getting so...
body:
I’M STARTING THE MCU MARATHON!

Today is 4 of april, RDJ birthday, I'n watching IronMan 1, the movie that got me hook to RDJ and Tony Stark, and I’m getting so many flashbacks and foreshadowing right now TTuTT

I’m going to watch one movie per day, with the exception of Captain Marvel, but it is still fresh in my memory 😎

Wish me luck and see you all at the premiere of Avengers End Game!!!

blog.name: dyionisiac
blog.title: About half Stony
blog.description: Just a blog about Comics, My ship, random rambling, politics, classism, raceism, Queer identity, feminism, and other rage against the system.  90% reblogs.  I started this for pure fangirl squee, but reality worked it's way in.

summary: I honestly don't know why so many people don't like this movie.  I really love it.  My roommate says it "feels like a movie with...
body: I honestly don’t know why so many people don’t like this movie. I really love it. My roommate says it “feels like a movie with Iron Man in it, not an Iron Man movie.” I think this may be the movie most about Tony rather than about Iron Man, but that could also be said about 3. If so, this one does it better.

reblog.comment: I honestly don’t know why so many people don’t like this movie. I really love it. My roommate says it “feels like a movie with Iron Man in it, not an Iron Man movie.” I think this may be the movie most about Tony rather than about Iron Man, but that could also be said about 3. If so, this one does it better.

trail.content_raw: I honestly don’t know why so many people don’t like this movie. I really love it. My roommate says it “feels like a movie with Iron Man in it, not an Iron Man movie.” I think this may be the movie most about Tony rather than about Iron Man, but that could also be said about 3. If so, this one does it better.
trail.content: I honestly don’t know why so many people don’t like this movie. I really love it. My roommate says it “feels like a movie with Iron Man in it, not an Iron Man movie.” I think this may be the movie most about Tony rather than about Iron Man, but that could also be said about 3. If so, this one does it better.

summary: If you notice this one is going fast, it's because I was too into it to do this in actual real time, but I'm going to put down...
body:
If you notice this one is going fast, it’s because I was too into it to do this in actual real time, but I’m going to put down everything I remember saying to my roommate as we watched.

So Iron Man 2

tags: if you do not like any of them pls do not interact your opinion is not valid
summary: do you just stop and think how 2008 was this great turning point for the superhero genre due to the iconic performaces of rdj...
body: do you just stop and think how 2008 was this great turning point for the superhero genre due to the iconic performaces of rdj and heath ledger, where both heath and downey had their talents belittled by homophobes who did not like the idea of having ledger in the joker’s role after he starred brokeback mountain and by the critics and public who doubted that rdj could regain his prestige in hollywood and they not only starred in two of the most lucrative films that year but iron man and the dark knight became references to how comicbooks inspired films can be not only entertainment but bringing contemporary messages, having complex characters and inspiring social critiques. yeah those two icons were born on april 4th. amazing
